explanation: [0-0] In an indoor setting, a man wearing a gray T-shirt sits in front of a TV on the left side. He's holding a plate of food in his right hand and using a fork in his left hand to put food in his mouth. On the TV screen to the right, a woman is putting orange food into her mouth with her right hand. In the upper left corner, there's a pink vase with yellow flowers.

[0-5] The man in the gray T-shirt chews his food and glances forward. He then pokes the TV screen with his fork, causing the clear liquid from the orange food in the woman's hand to spray onto her nose. The man widens his eyes and looks forward, then turns to the TV screen and points at it with his right index finger. The woman in the TV opens her mouth wide and looks to the left.
